post.title: fs - nexus one for att, rogers, etc. - bnib with froyo!
post.content: i have for sale a brand new, unlocked google nexus one for att, rogers, etc. this device was opened, rooted and flashed and then put for sale. not a single scratch, ding, dent or anything else wrong with it. it comes with all original accessories (a/c adapter, data cable, pouch, battery) as well as original box and documentation. original sales receipt available upon request. i will sell for $599 usd shipped in the us or canada. link to the photo gallery here. pm me with any questions. you can view my feedback here. thanks!
